thread.section_title: Hotel des Belges - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of Hotel des Belges, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: stefaan69
title: Good location
text:
we were here with our godchild, and stayed for 3 days/2 nights
at first you enter a normal cafe, it looks a bit ancient, and a bit messy; but the staff is helpfull and friendly
We could leave our suitcases behind because we were a bit to early, and when we returned they already placed the suitcases in our room !!! Excellent service ;-)
Also the rooms are not very modern, but they are clean and fresh sheets.
The owner also recommended us with several pointers for our stay. So i can only recommend this hotel. If you are not that difficult on a bit outdated hotel, but you want to stay in a clean, and in the middle of everything in Paris, then you should stay here. There is no escalator; so if you are not that good with your legs, better to ask a room on the first floor :-) We were happy, and will return !
